Value.label: Smoke
Value.Help: Report the beginning and the end of smoke alarm detection

Value.label: Low Battery
Value.Help: When the battery level of the detector drops to an unacceptable level, the detector will sound once every 30 seconds and send low battery report to the nodes of Grouping 1 once per hour. .

Value.label: Tamper Event
Value.Help: When the tamper is triggered (that is, the detector is opened with tamper switch being released), the detector will send Tamper event report to the nodes of Grouping 1.

Value.label: Battery Level
Value.Help: The users can also enquire the battery status of the detector by sending BATTERY_ GET command via controller, however, this procedure can only be done during 5-second time allowance after the tamper switch/detector being triggered or 10 minutes wakeup time when power is first applied. Once the detector receives the command, it will return BATTERY_REPORT command.
